invitation

Invite a user to the system.

Attribute Comment Format Attributes
uid  The unique key.  uid
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		pk
required
 
statusCode  The status.  letterCode
max length: 1
allows( letters ) 		required
 
typeCode  The type.  letterCode
max length: 1
allows( letters ) 		required
 
accessKey  A long unique (~unguessable) code that allows the user to access this object without a password.  uid
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		required
 
createdUtcTs  When the object was created.  timestamp required
 
closedUtcTs  When the object was used.  timestamp  
email  The email to which the invitation was sent.  email
max length: 50
allows( printable ) 		required

max length: 1
allows( letters )
